entry.title: Wedding & House Warming Turkish Cotton Gift Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Royal Turkish Towels
Type: Towel Set
Price: 126.99

The perfect gift set for everyone you love. Luxury bathrobes and plush towel sets. Bathrobes are 50 inches long and one size fits all. The towel set in the box 2 pieces of large 30 X 56 inches bath towels 2 pieces of 16 X 27 inches hand towels 2 pieces of 13 X 13 inches washcloths. Quality of the Turkish towels and bathrobes, this is the gift you can have it or give it. No one will forget you with this gift box! 8 pc set with one size fits all silky velour and soft terry robes. 700 gsm plush Turkish towels. 2 large bath towels, 2 hand towels and 2 washcloths.

  • STYLE: Wedding
  • TYPE: Towel Set
  • SIZE(S): 30" x 56", 16" x 27", 13" x 13", OSFA
  • QUANTITY INCLUDED: 8
  • FABRIC THICKNESS: ﻿700 GSM
  • MADE IN: Turkey
  • THIS SET INCLUDES: 2 Bath Towels, 2 Hand Towels, 2 Washcloths & 2 Bathrobes
  • WHOLESALE AVAILABLE!
